thread.title: BIMobject, a Game Changer for Manufacturers, Advances How Building Manufacturers Communicate with Designers, Engineers, and Architects
thread.title_full: BIMobject, a Game Changer for Manufacturers, Advances How Building Manufacturers Communicate with Designers, Engineers, and Architects - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: BIMobject, a Game Changer for Manufacturers, Advances How Building Manufacturers Communicate with Designers, Engineers, and Architects
text:
BIMobject will be hosting BIMobject LIVe Worldwide Business Conference 2015 in San Francisco, USA 29th of October 2015.
San Francisco, CA (PRWEB) September 21, 2015
BIMobject revolutionizes the way manufacturers communicate with designers, engineers and architects. Our unique BIM (Building Information Modelling) product portals, cloud solutions and BIM analytics tools change the way manufacturers market their products while generating leads and prospects for their sales organizations. BIMobject is the global provider of BIM solutions for the rendition of 2D and 3D CAD digital prototypes of manufacturers products. The mission of BIMobject is to become the global industry standard for supplying architects, engineers and designers with product prototypes of manufacturers as digital objects.
BIMobject is hosting a unique opportunity for manufacturers in a worldwide business conference, BIMobject Live 2015, in San Francisco on the 29th of October, where the benefits of BIM technology will be showcased to US manufacturers in the building product industry.
“We are very excited to get together with building product manufacturers in San Francisco to share experiences in BIM and our new innovative technologies. I believe that the American market for BIMobject’s products provide the absolute best opportunities for manufacturers to present their products at a new level when it comes to user experience and capital return”, says Alan Akman, President, BIMobject Inc.
BIMobject has attained a distinct position in world markets with established subsidiaries and business partners in several countries.
Earlier this year, BIMobject launched its American subsidiary ahead of time due to the success in Europe.
For more information or to sign up for the conference BIMobject® LIVe in San Francisco, click here!
About BIMobject®:
BIMobject® is a game changer for the construction industry worldwide with its cloud-based Portal offering, development, maintenance and syndication of digital replicas – BIM objects – of manufactured building and interior products.
The marketing and pre-sales services associated with the Portal are channeled and integrated, through specialized software, into CAD/BIM applications to create a business-to-business communication across the globe.
Manufacturers use BIMobject® to promote and deliver their products directly into BIM processes enabling their products to be selected and generate a real improvement in sales.
BIMobject® - Winner of the Red Herring Europe Top 100 Award 2013, Winner of the 2013 Red Herring 100 Global Award and Winner of the IAIR EUROPEAN AWARDS 2013!
BIMobject AB - a public company listed on NASDAQ First North Stockholm: Share Ticker: BIM
Certified Advisor: Sedermera Fondkommission
